Posts.EditableText:
This started out being just a game to test out some scripts I'd written; but in the course of playing with it, it gained a little playability. So not sure if I should show it off to other people yet; but if you want to see some of my scripts from a player's point of view, give it a try:

http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/luz7uwwsuuqfmk-pmtnx8w/disposable-game

(There are four rooms; they don't have descriptions. They'll respawn some items as you walk around. There's a crafting system, and a vague objective is to make a campfire and cook supper)

This started out being just a game to test out some scripts I'd written; but in the course of playing with it, it gained a little playability. So not sure if I should show it off to other people yet; but if you want to see some of my scripts from a player's point of view, give it a try:

http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/luz7uwwsuuqfmk-pmtnx8w/disposable-game

(There are four rooms; they don't have descriptions. They'll respawn some items as you walk around. There's a crafting system, and a vague objective is to make a campfire and cook supper)
